wikipedia_page.main: George Hope (born 4 March 1954 in Haltwhistle, Northumberland, England), is an English footballer who played as a forward in the Football League.

response: * George Hope (American football), head college football coach for the University of Richmond Spiders
* George Hope (Royal Navy officer) (1869–1959), Deputy First Sea Lord during World War I
* George Hope (Australian footballer) (1891–1964), Australian rules footballer
